name: Horenso No Goma Miso Ae (Spinach with Sesame Miso Sauce)
description: Spinach is tossed with a nutty sesame sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. In batches, blanch spinach for 30 seconds and drain. Wring blanched spinach to remove as much water as possible.
Roughly chop spinach and place in a large bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together sesame paste, miso paste, water, and soy sauce until well combined.
Add sesame sauce to spinach and toss to coat. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve.
